briefdescription.para: Prefixs used to differienciate exchanged data between display, core and software.

detaileddescription.para: All image offset, used by included software to keep track of picture offset
Roboto Regular 16 px (+ special character), main font used almost everywhere.
Robot Regular 24 px (+ special character), secondary font used sometimes.
Roboto Regular 32 px (+ special character), secondary font used sometimes.
